params.depositSalt: User generated salt for vault nonce
params.initialDepositAmount: Amount of ERC20 tokens to deposit including fee

depositLiquidityWithOverwrite(address,ui.details: Identical to depositLiquidity, but allows for overwriting an existing empty vault

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payoutToFeeRouter().details: Reverts if there are no fees to pay or if the transfer fails

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.compressedBlockLeaves: Compressed block data for MMR Data Availability
params.newMmrRoot: Updated MMR root at least incluing up to the confirmation block
params.priorMmrRoot: Previous MMR root used to generate this swap proof
params.proposedBlockCumulativeChainwork: Cumulative chainwork up to this block
params.proposedBlockHash: Hash of the Bitcoin block containing the swap
params.specifiedPayoutAddress: Address to receive the swap proceeds
params.vaults: Array of deposit vaults being used in the swap

submitSwapProofWithOverwrite(bytes32,uin.details: All other parameters are identical to submitSwapProof

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawLiquidity((uint256,uint64,uint25.details: Anyone can call, reverts if vault doesn't exist, is empty, or still in lockup period

params.vault: The deposit vault to withdraw from

depositLiquidity(address,uint256,uint64,.notice: Deposits new liquidity into a new vault

depositLiquidityWithOverwrite(address,ui.notice: Deposits new liquidity by overwriting an existing empty vault

payoutToFeeRouter().notice: Sends accumulated protocol fees to the fee router contract

submitSwapProof(bytes32,uint64,uint256,(.notice: Submits a new swap proof and adds it to swapCommitments

submitSwapProofWithOverwrite(bytes32,uin.notice: Same as submitSwapProof but overwrites an existing completed swap commitment

withdrawLiquidity((uint256,uint64,uint25.notice: Withdraws liquidity from a deposit vault after the lockup period

documentation.text:
@notice Sends accumulated protocol fees to the fee router contract
 @dev Reverts if there are no fees to pay or if the transfer fails

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Types.DepositVault calldata,bytes32[] storage pointer) view returns (bytes32)

documentation.text: @notice Completes deposit by emitting event and transferring tokens

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct Types.DepositVault calldata,bytes32[] storage pointer) view returns (bytes32)
function (struct Types.DepositVault calldata[] calldata,bytes32[] storage pointer) view returns (bytes32)

function (uint256,bytes32,uint64,uint256,struct Types.DepositVault calldata[] calldata,address,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint256,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) returns (struct Types.ProposedSwap memory,bytes32)
function (struct Types.ProposedSwap calldata,bytes32[] storage pointer) view returns (bytes32)

function (uint256,bytes32,uint64,uint256,struct Types.DepositVault calldata[] calldata,address,bytes32,bytes32,uint256,uint256,bytes calldata,bytes calldata) returns (struct Types.ProposedSwap memory,bytes32)
function (struct Types.ProposedSwap calldata,bytes32[] storage pointer) view returns (bytes32)
function (struct Types.BlockLeaf memory,bytes32[] calldata) view returns (bool)
function (struct Types.DepositVault calldata[] calldata,bytes32[] storage pointer) view returns (bytes32)
